thread.title: Elaine Wethy
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Elaine Wethy

author: Elaine Wethy
title: Elaine Wethy
text: Kim our sales person was wonderful, let us shop around and there when we needed her without hounding us that is a big thing for us! We picked out what we wanted discussed our options and she took care of us instantly and effortlessly! Shopping at Gardner-White was wonderful and we will go back again! Delivery was awesome and the guys were great brought in our furniture set it up cleaned up and were gone no problems!! Highly Recommend Gardner-White!!
